entry.title: The Last One Left
entry.summary:
Author: sacredORDINARYdays

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,681Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: “I’m sorry for your loss.”“Thank you. I–Don’t be sorry. At the very least, they have all found their peace. I like to think that somewhere, everyone is reunited at last.”“Everyone?”Sorrow, for a moment, clouds the man’s face.“Yes,” he breathes, “I am– the last one left.”Or:The last one left alive AU
